argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | strlem3.1 | |- S = ( x e. CH |-> ( ( normh ` ( ( projh ` x ) ` u ) ) ^ 2 ) ) |
| 2 |  | strlem3.2 | |- ( ph <-> ( u e. ( A \ B ) /\ ( normh ` u ) = 1 ) ) |
| 3 |  | strlem3.3 | |- A e. CH |
| 4 |  | strlem3.4 | |- B e. CH |
| 5 | 1 | #P_strlem2 | |- ( A e. CH -> ( S ` A ) = ( ( normh ` ( ( projh ` A ) ` u ) ) ^ 2 ) ) |
| 6 | 3, 5 | #P_ax-mp | |- ( S ` A ) = ( ( normh ` ( ( projh ` A ) ` u ) ) ^ 2 ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eldifi | |- ( u e. ( A \ B ) -> u e. A ) |
| 8 |  | #P_pjid | |- ( ( A e. CH /\ u e. A ) -> ( ( projh ` A ) ` u ) = u ) |
| 9 | 3, 8 | #P_mpan | |- ( u e. A -> ( ( projh ` A ) ` u ) = u ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( u e. A -> ( normh ` ( ( projh ` A ) ` u ) ) = ( normh ` u ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_eqeq2 | |- ( ( normh ` u ) = 1 -> ( ( normh ` ( ( projh ` A ) ` u ) ) = ( normh ` u ) <-> ( normh ` ( ( projh ` A ) ` u ) ) = 1 ) ) |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_syl5ib | |- ( ( normh ` u ) = 1 -> ( u e. A -> ( normh ` ( ( projh ` A ) ` u ) ) = 1 ) ) |
| 13 | 7, 12 | #P_mpan9 | |- ( ( u e. ( A \ B ) /\ ( normh ` u ) = 1 ) -> ( normh ` ( ( projh ` A ) ` u ) ) = 1 ) |
| 14 | 2, 13 | #P_sylbi | |- ( ph -> ( normh ` ( ( projh ` A ) ` u ) ) = 1 ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( ph -> ( ( normh ` ( ( projh ` A ) ` u ) ) ^ 2 ) = ( 1 ^ 2 ) ) |
| 16 |  | #P_sq1 | |- ( 1 ^ 2 ) = 1 |
| 17 | 15, 16 | #P_syl6eq | |- ( ph -> ( ( normh ` ( ( projh ` A ) ` u ) ) ^ 2 ) = 1 ) |
| 18 | 6, 17 | #P_syl5eq | |- ( ph -> ( S ` A ) = 1 ) |
